markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Fangs](/Feats.aspx?ID=1336) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Dhampir" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=215" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 33 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Your incisors have grown into true fangs: long, sharp, and well-suited to drawing blood. You gain a fangs unarmed attack that deals 1d6 piercing damage. Your fangs are in the [brawling](/WeaponGroups.aspx?ID=4) group and have the [grapple](/Traits.aspx?ID=184) and [unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199) traits.
name: Fangs
